title: Enhancing Instructional Design Competencies Through Teacher-Generative AI Interaction

context.prior_knowledge: Basic instructional design theory and understanding of language education methodologies
context.additional_context: Enhances teacher agency through instructional design practice utilizing generative AI in a smartphone-based microlearning environment.

learning_goals: Learners can revise drafts of language education instructional designs using generative AI tools at least three times
Learners can present at least two strategies comparing interactions between expert bots and basic AI chatbots and applying them to instructional design processes
Learners can diagnose their level of initiative demonstrated in AI-supported instructional design using a three-tier self-assessment scale through project-based evaluation

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
